name: Javelin Madness
description:
Javelin Madness is a 3-D javelin throwing game that's inspired by the classics.

Features:
  • Choose male or female character
  • Player experience points and levels
  • Purchase gear and special abilities to boost your performance
  • Daily reward from sponsors (throwing activity affects the amount of reward)
  • Coach that comments your performance
  • High score lists:
    • all
    • day
    • week
    • month
  • Coming soon: Player created leagues
